Steps.Message: We became aware of this power cut at 13:13. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: Following on from a recent unplanned power cut you may have experienced on the 26th May 2021 we have identified a piece of equipment called a transformer that needs repairing. This equipment controls, protects and isolates electrical equipment on our electricity network and in order for this to be repaired safely we will need to temporarily switch off your power. Once work is completed this will ensure the network is working to the best of its ability and reduce the risk of you having further unplanned power cuts. This work is taking place on at our equipment near Belle Vue Cottages. The government has given exemptions to certain industries and activities, this outage falls into this category. To reassure you we are adhering to the latest government guidelines to keep all our customers and colleagues safe. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by this work and thank you for your patience.
